definitions.text: position or state of being dominant or in control
examples: that idea was in the ascendant

definitions.text: someone from whom you are descended (but usually more remote than a grandparent)
tending or directed upward; - John Ruskin
examples: rooted and ascendant strength like that of foliage

definitions.text: most powerful or important or influential
examples: D-day is considered the dominating event of the war in Europe
